attributes.action: Admonish the US Ambassador re treatment of Sir Kim Darroch by President Trump
attributes.background: President Donald Trump has made public statements insulting the competence and integrity of the UK’s ambassador to the US, Sir Kim Darroch. The government and people of the UK need to convey, through the Foreign Secretary, that President Trump’s comments are unacceptable.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to admonish the ambassador. You could sign this petition instead:
	
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/267045
